attributes.action: Stop the sale of fire works unless it is people doing organised display events.
attributes.additional_details:
This is because alot of awareness has come to light that animals are becoming so distressed that they are dying from the noise. Every year we hear of people being cruel and tieing fireworks to animals and setting them off whist on the animal. People who have been through various wars are petrified as the sound and flashing from fireworks remind them of the sound of bombs. Fireworks are dangerous when they fall into the wrong hands.
Please we need to stop this now.
attributes.background: Please stop people buying fireworks unless they are being used for organised firework displays.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591501
